actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of certain former members of the Army who participated in the dengue fever experiments in the Philippine Islands.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay $150.00 per month to certain former members of the United States Army, or a specified percentage of such sum to surviving unremarried widows of such members, who participated in the dengue fever experiments in the Philippine Islands.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of certain former members of the Army who participated in the dengue fever experiments in the Philippine Islands.
